title: Apigee - Manage revisions
abstract:
# Apigee - Manage revisions
**    Preview    — Apigee API hub ** This feature is subject to the "Pre-GA Offerings Terms" in the General Service Terms section   of the [Service Specific Terms](/terms/service-terms#1) .     Pre-GA features are available "as is" and might have limited support.    For more information, see the [launch stage descriptions](/products#product-launch-stages) .
Every API in API hub can have multiple versions, and each version can have a specification  which can have multiple revisions. The **History** tab on the APIs page lists every  specification revision across all versions of the API.
content:
## Sort revision table
Click the **Updated** column heading to sort the table.
## Add revision
To add a revision:
- In the Google Cloud console, go to the **API hub** page. [Go to API hub](https://console.cloud.google.com/apigee/hub/apis) The **APIs** list page is displayed by default.
- From **APIs** list, click an API row. The **Overview** tab is displayed by default.
- Select the **History** tab.
- Click **Add revision** .
- Click **Browse** and then select a description document or zip file.
- Click **Open** .
- Specify **Details** :- Select an **API version** .
- Select a [MIME type](https://apigee.github.io/registry/media_types.html) . If you select **Other** , a text field is displayed where    you can manually specify the MIME type.
- Type a **Commit message** (optional).
- Type a **Commit hash** (optional).- Click **Save** (or **Cancel** ).
**Note:** The **ID** column in the **History** table is the ID of the revision    as it appears in the registry API.
## View revision
[View or download a specification](/apigee/docs/api-hub/view-spec)
## Delete revision
To delete a revision:
- In the Cloud console, go to the **API hub** page. [Go to API hub](https://console.cloud.google.com/apigee/hub/apis) The **APIs** list page is displayed by default.
- From **APIs** list, click an API row. The **Overview** tab is displayed by default.
- Select the **History** tab.
- Clickdelete **Delete** next to the desired revision.
- Click **Delete** (or **Cancel** ) at the prompt.
